00025 /*! \file walltime_c.h
00026  *  Functionality for reading wall clock time

00028  *  Copyright (C) 2010 Max-Planck-Society
00029  *  \author Martin Reinecke

00032 #ifndef PLANCK_WALLTIME_C_H
00033 #define PLANCK_WALLTIME_C_H
00034 
00035 #ifdef __cplusplus
00036 extern "C" {
00037 #endif
00038 
00039 /*! Returns an approximation of the current wall time (in seconds).
00040     The first available of the following timers will be used:
00041     <ul>
00042     <li> \a omp_get_wtime(), if OpenMP is available
00043     <li> \a MPI_Wtime(), if MPI is available
00044     <li> \a gettimeofday() otherwise
00045     </ul>
00046     \note Only useful for measuring time differences.
00047     \note This function has an execution time between 10 and 100 nanoseconds. */
00048 double wallTime(void);
00049 
00050 #ifdef __cplusplus
00051 }
00052 #endif
00053 
00054 #endif
